text: Super fun team building experience! Very professional and entertaining! time just flew by! 100% recommend and will use this company again for our next team building! Thank you again Bertrand we had a wonderful time!
A pretty fun activity to do as a group with friends or colleagues! Nothing too stressful. Had an enjoyable time. Just wished the app used was a bit more stable but it was fun nonetheless!!

Our team had fun doing the amazing race in Jewel! It was a great workout after an amazing lunch buffet and with the use of technology, it makes it easier. It was not hot too since it all happened in the mall itself. Bert and his partner were very welcoming and their service was excellent! Thank you for making it fun for our team!
A great tema builidng with fun and egaging activities!

Thank you to Bertrand and team for providing wonderful experiences for our corporate partners through the wine murder mystery at our office! Kudos to the team for fulfilling our requests to incorporate our company branding in the event.
